citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:30 PM
on 10/08/2015. No one was home upon arrival and the licensee was reached by cell phone. It was determined that
the licensee was at work and unable to be present for the inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:30 PM
on 10/08/2015. No one was home upon arrival and the licensee was reached by cell phone. It was determined that
the licensee was at work and unable to be present for the inspection.
